component.name: Voyc
component.summary: Fast, minimal voice dictation for Linux

description.p: Voyc is a fast, minimal, GNOME-native voice dictation application for Linux Wayland. It captures audio via PipeWire, transcribes using ElevenLabs or OpenAI speech-to-text APIs, and injects the text directly into your focused application.

ul.li: Global hotkey support (Ctrl+Alt+D) for hands-free operation
System tray integration for quick access
Support for ElevenLabs and OpenAI speech-to-text providers
Smart post-processing for improved punctuation and formatting
Native Wayland support with GTK4 and libadwaita
Privacy-focused: audio is processed in real-time and not stored
